title: Expecting all BRAND properties to be saved as provided
gherkin:
When the user creates a BRAND "DKW" with the following valid data
  | key       | value           |
  | name      | DKW             |
  | full_name | Dampfkraftwagen |
  | founded   | 1916            |
  | defunct   | 1966            |
  | wmi       | -               |
  | hsn       | 0010            |
Then the response should contain the following data
  | key       | value           |
  | name      | DKW             |
  | full_name | Dampfkraftwagen |
  | founded   | 1916            |
  | defunct   | 1966            |
  | wmi       | -               |
  | hsn       | 0010            |
